snippet.title: Black Death Interactive | Reimagine Education | Immersive Experiential Learning Award Nominee
snippet.description:
Venture into the plague-ridden streets of 14th century Venice with this haunting title sequence for "Black Death Interactive", (our iPad app, available now, for free, on the Apple App Store): https://apps.apple.com/us/app/black-death/id6475729895 

Created for the Curious Refuge AI Horror Film Competition, this 2-minute title sequence leverages the cutting-edge of AI animation to set the stage for our immersive historical horror experience, blending education with spine-tingling atmosphere.

🕰️ Haunting evocations of plague-ridden Venice
🎭 Witness the Danse Macabre drifting through Venice's putrid canals
🖤 Follow Giana's heart-wrenching choices as the plague closes in
💀 Encounter chilling visions of the Grim Reaper stalking the city

Our frontier model AI Tools pipeline combines:
Midjourney image creation; Runway Gen-3, Kling AI, and Luma Labs' Dream Machine for animation; and Topaz Labs AI for 4K upscaling and 8x slow-motion enhancement; pushing the boundaries of visual storytelling.

"Black Death Interactive" is a time machine to humanity's darkest hour. Experience the horror. Learn the history. Survive the Black Death.

Learn more about our project:
🌐 Website: https://www.historyadventures.co/black-death-app/
📱 App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/black-death/id6475729895 
📘 Instagram: @spencerstriker
🐦 Twitter: @spencerstriker 
 
#AIFilmmaking #CuriousRefuge #BlackDeath #HistoricalHorror #AIArt #aianimation #AITools #interactiondesign #IndieGame #learninggames #horrorfilm #titlesequence 

For inquiries: https://www.spencerstriker.com/contact 
Music credits: Dark Space by Ave Air (Courtesy of Epidemic Sound)

©2024 Spencer Striker | Digital Media

@curiousrefuge @TheoreticallyMedia @FILMCRUX @HistoryAdventures
